txt.en: Thama Aklam has become home to a number of brigands, many of whom are bored and hope for a fight worthy of their skills.\n\nDefeat brigands in Thama Aklam.
Thama Aklam has become home to a number of brigands.
Approach the camp at Thama Aklam to determine possible goings on.

As you approach the brigand camp, you begin to hear rumblings of frustration and discontentment.

'It's been days since we had a good scrap,' you hear one complain.

Perhaps you could satiate their boredom with a light scuffle or twelve.
You should let Irzeben know that you have defeated many brigands.
You have tussled with many bandits. Perhaps they will be less inclined to start trouble along the road.
Discover the camp of Thama Aklam
You have defeated many brigands in Thama Aklam.
